class: middle

.larger[Getting Specific]

Often you are interested in **one** specific summary statistic!

```{r}
starwars %>% 
  group_by(homeworld) %>% 
  summarize(mean_height = mean(height)) %>% 
  filter(homeworld == "Tatooine")
```

---

class: middle

.larger[A Handy Tool]

`pull()` 

- Extracts entries from dataframes

```{r}
starwars %>% 
  group_by(homeworld) %>% 
  summarize(mean_height = mean(height)) %>% 
  filter(homeworld == "Tatooine") %>% 
  pull()
```
